section.section: The Governor shall appoint a Deputy Assistant Adjutant General for the Maryland Army National Guard.
The Deputy Assistant Adjutant General serves at the pleasure of the Adjutant General.

text.section:
The Deputy Assistant Adjutant General for the Maryland Army National Guard shall:
have a commissioned grade not above that of Brigadier General; and
perform the military duties assigned by the Governor or the Adjutant General.
